__comment1: This file is not actually used. It's here for demonstration.
__comment2: For any text field, it's possible to utilize Minecraft's own text components.
__comment3: See this website to make them easily: https://minecraft.tools/en/json_text.php.
__comment4: If using the website, when you're done, click on 'Generate JSON Text',
__comment5: then copy the result from 'JSON SYNTAX FOR MINECRAFT JAVA EDITION (1.16+)'
__comment6: and paste it, as single element, inside 'tips'.
__title_comment1: Text component present above every tooltip. We can use this as a signature
__title_comment2: If unsure, just change the 'text' and 'color' to your liking.
__tips_comment1: A list of text components, each representing a single tip that will be displayed
__tips_comment3: IMPORTANT: the JSON format needs a comma after each element EXCEPT THE LAST.
__tips_comment4: Because of how easy it is to miss commas (without the right text editor),
__tips_comment5: I would suggest adding commas right between lines, as follows:
tips: This is a string element that cannot have any cool formatting!

tips.text: This is a simple Text Component without formatting
